HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: Sådan ændres størrelsen på et billede
steps: Klik på Vælg fil for at uploade billedet fra din enhed, eller klik på rullemenuen for at uploade fra Dropbox eller Google Drev.
Juster billedets dimensioner og format i henhold til de ønskede specifikationer.
Klik på Forhåndsvisning for at se de ændringer, du har foretaget.
Gem dine ændringer ved at klikke på knappen Gem ændringer.
Klik på knappen Download for at få det tilpassede billede.

FAQ.question: What's the difference between scaling and resizing? The resizer image to 30x36 dimensions tool is used to perform the scaling?
FAQ.answer: The biggest difference between scaling and resizing lies in the way that the resolution of the image is altered. While resizing involves a more exact pixel size, scaling is a less exact process. In this case, the original image must be multiples of the final size, which can result in a pixelated effect. This is a key feature to consider when resizing an image. Using the resizer image to 30x36 dimensions tool, we can only resize images in inches; it is not useful for scaling.
